---
id: pause-experiment
title: "PauseExperiment"
description: "Temporarily pauses an inprogress experiment, suspending its effects while preserving the experiment config for later resumption."

Temporarily pauses an inprogress experiment, suspending its effects while preserving the experiment config for later resumption.
